My Work

Check out some of my projects...

COVID Tracker

The app fetches daily and region specific data from a COVID-19 API and displays the statistics in numbers and graphs.

Stack: React, react-chartjs

Project Github

Mars Weather

The app fetches data from a NASA API and display daily and weekly weather forecast on Mars.

Stack: React, TypeScript, Styled Components

Project Github

Mini Piano

A mini one-octave piano that lets you click to play the notes and hear the sounds!

Stack: React, TypeScript, React Testing Library, Styled Components

Project Github

Todo List

A Todoist clone that lets you add list of tasks and projects and keep tracks of daily and weekly to-do items.

Stack: React, React Testing Library, Firebase, SCSS

Project Github

Job Seeker's Journal

The app lets user update and keep track of their job search progress and where they are in the job interviewing process.

Stack: React, Redux, Recharts, Enzyme, Mongoose, Mocha, Chai
